// src/components/LandingPage.js import React from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import "./LandingPage.css"; // Create this file for custom styles const LandingPage = () => { const history = useHistory(); const footpaths = [ { id: 1, title: "Footpath 1", description: "Description of Footpath 1", icon: "📚", }, { id: 2, title: "Footpath 2", description: "Description of Footpath 2", icon: "🔍", }, // Add more footpaths as needed ]; const handleCardClick = (id) => { history.push(`/exhibitions/${id}`); // Navigate to the exhibition page }; return (

Explore the different learning footpaths we have to offer!

{footpaths.map((footpath) => (
handleCardClick(footpath.id)} >

))}
); }; export default LandingPage;
